original_text: You must obey the rules that he commanded you to obey in his covenant. You must not serve or worship other gods. If you turn against him, the Lord your God will be very angry with you. Then very soon none of you will remain in this good land that he has given to you.’
korean_text: 만일 너희가 너희의 하나님 여호와께서 너희에게 명령하신 언약을 범하고 가서 다른 신들을 섬겨 그들에게 절하면 여호와의 진노가 너희에게 미치리니 너희에게 주신 아름다운 땅에서 너희가 속히 멸망하리라 하니라

sentences.original_text: that he commanded you to obey
You must not serve or worship other gods
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 다른 신들을 섬기거나 경배해서는 안 된다

sentences.original_text: the Lord your God will be very angry with you
sentences.korean_translation: 주 너희 하나님이 너희에게 진노하실 것이다
너희 중 아무도 남지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: that he has given to you
